Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.db.dao

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MysqlUserDaoImpl
    public interface UserDao
    Provides methods to deal with users table in the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int count​(java.sql.Connection connection)  
      void delete​(java.sql.Connection connection, int id)
      Method delete deletes a row which represents a user in the table users.

      Method get retrieves a row from the table users by the specified id.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.Optional<User> get​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                             int id)
                      throws DbException
        Method get retrieves a row from the table users by the specified id. If table does not contain a row with specified id returns empty Optional.
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        id - id of a user to find.
        Returns:
        Optional representing a row from the table.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.

      • get

        java.util.Optional<User> get​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                             java.lang.String email)
                      throws DbException
        Method get retrieves a row from the table users by the specified email. If table does not contain a row with specified email returns empty Optional.
        Parameters:
        connection - - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        email - email of a user to find.
        Returns:
        Optional representing a row from the table.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<User> getAll​(java.sql.Connection connection)
                     throws DbException
        Method getAll retrieves all rows from the table users
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        Returns:
        List representing all rows from the table.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.

      • update

        void update​(java.sql.Connection connection,
            User user)
     throws DbException
        Method update updates a row which represents a user in the table users.
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        user - a user to be updated.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be updated.

      • delete

        void delete​(java.sql.Connection connection,
            int id)
     throws DbException
        Method delete deletes a row which represents a user in the table users.
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        id - id of a user to be deleted.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be deleted.

      • insert

        int insert​(java.sql.Connection connection,
           User user)
    throws DbException,
           ValidationException
        Method insert inserts a row to the table users with data specified in user.
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        user - a user to be inserted.
        Returns:
        id of the inserted User.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be deleted.
        ValidationException - is thrown if user data is incorrect or user with same id or email is already exists in the database

      • count

        int count​(java.sql.Connection connection)
   throws DbException
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        Returns:
        number of rows in the table users.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.
